LOGAN.raw_line: Wake up...come on, Logan-6.Hey, cut that out !Now you've done it...Logan-5...Francis-7, authorized duty quadrant. Intrusion accidental.Has anyone ever broken in to where the babies are?just wondered...what happens?but you don't know, you Just say what everyone says. One for one. One for one."Did you ever see Francis-8?Well...you can't have them all.You should have been with us in Nursery, Daniel. I'm positive I recognized him -Want me to take your shift? I'm feeling restless anywayNow there's a few who could have been his seed-mother.Looks like I'm working.Who invited you?Runner terminated 0:31 Ready for cleanup.That was a great shot you made.What's wrong, Available?Please . . . no ? You mean "not here"--that's it? You're a private Available but particular, Don't worry. There's no one here but me. And you.You prefer women?Well then...?Sad? What made you sad?Yes...probably he was renewed?Killed? Why do you use that word?I never 'killed' anybody in my life. Sandmen terminate Runners Who brought you?You felt sad. What's your name?You're beautiful. Let's have sex.Later.But you put yourself on the circuit!And?And now?About what?Let's have sex. I thought you were curious.I'm listening.I'm not armed. Well?You shouldn't even think such things... And you picked a strange person to say them to -So? Do what everyone does. Try like hell for renewal.When this turns black...that's it. If for any reason you want to be 31... you have the same chance as everyone else...Carrousel.You're years away . . . I don't know why you're thinking of these things, much less talking about them. Want to try?What Quad do you live in?It's nice to know you can nod.It's nice co know you can do that, too.What happened to you?How come?Get yourself a new face while you're at it They know you now.I just might look in on New You 483 myself.No -- it's that last Runner -- someone in 483 was trying to help him.Negative. Question: What is it?Negative.I don't understand?Question:1056 unaccounted for?!Impossible! Question: Maybe they weren't all Runners. Maybe most of them reached Life Renewal on Carousel.Question: None of them reached renewal?But everyone believes that some....Question: You mean nobody's ever been renewed?I will.Question: What if I need help from another Sandman?Question: I am six Red...how can I pretend to be approaching Lastday?My Lifeclock... Question: My Life--Question: Am I still six Red?Did you ever see anybody renew?Did you?Anybody we know?I'm fine.... See you....Location...female Green Six... name Jessica...living in Quad K.She has.But I wasn't sure you'd come.I couldn't get you out of my mind.Maybe...sure....Of course.You knowAll right.I'm going to run.You know something.Both...running's what I'm interested in.It's different now. Help me.A Runner gave it to me.I let him go...believe me.I don't have much time.What can I do to make you believe me?Are you here to help me?That's tomorrow.Maybe you'll chink of something...If you did know, you'd tell me.Tell me, Jessica.A Runner...Cathedral. A woman.Have you ever been through Cathedral?They're like beasts. Wild.Insane. Nurseries are better than any mother could be.Uh-uh.When did you begin to question Lastday?Let me go first. Sometimes they're waiting just inside there--to rush you when it opens...Quickly now--It's unauthorized. No good for any- one over thirteen anyhow--shakes you to pieces--speeds everything up to a blur-- you can see what happens when some flying Cub tries to go through this on muscle--splat!Not here. Might be a decoy.Runner!I'm a Sandman!No, for you! How old are you, Billy?Fourteen? Fifteen? Your days are running out. How long can you last? A year. Six months? What happens when you're sixteen and you go green?No cubs over fifteen, Billy! Ever heard of a cub with a green flower? You'll leave Cathedral then, Billy, when you're on green, because they won't let a green stay here. If you try to stay the young ones will gut-rip you apart!All right! How many of you want this to be Lastday?!Come on, Billy...come on...you cut a Sandman, didn't you?!Come on, Billy...cut me...Come onThey've got someone else! Why would anybody come here?Sanctuary? Anything?If they find you throw this hard enough to break it. Then hold your breath till you get away...It's blind gas.Where? Sanctuary? Can you take me there?Then - why don't you leave me - go to them - explainAll right. New You 483. I'll find out myself.Hello.It's all right with me. Is he here?No - Look, I'm in a hurry.Just one.Thanks. I thought you'd be older. I ex- pected a Red.Your own work?Just the face.Do I have to undress?I don't care...Just get it over with.Holly'd like dark hair.No - I'm Running!It has nothing to do with you.Are you taking me to them?Because he's my friend - and I don't want to be killed by him - or anyone.Will he find us and kill us? Yes...or one of the others. You know there's only one place to go now...I'd rather take my chances with them...than with Francis.I'm a runner. She brought me here because I begged her to help me.Yes I have. Now it's my turn. And I want to live.May we move?I don't know who you are. I'd like to thank someone.I Will there be someone to tell us where to go from there...?No. Jessica goes back now. Take her back. Now! Go on back. Back outside, Jessica.Why, Jessica? You're still a green.Come on then--they'll be here any minute!Wait - I have the one I took from the Runner.It's the only way.Some kind of breeding pens...I suppose...They say people used to breed animal s, fish, anything To eat, of course.It's brighter there...besides, we can't go back.It doesn't make any difference anymore.You knew that I wasn't before, didn't you? Why did you stay with me?I had to. I did kill...for the first time in my life I killed.I guess so...I know I felt something I never felt before...and I didn't like it...not a bit. I'll tell you one thing...Sanctuary better be worth it. That's the last place for me to live now.All right - what are you?This place is a link to Sanctuary, isn't it?We were sent here and you know it. Others have been sent here. Where are they? Hiding?Where do we go?! Where do we go from here??!!You know about Sanctuary! I know you do! You have to help us! You don't have a choice! It isn't your decision!! Tell us.Where do you send them?That's better. How do you want us?How do you want us?All right. Now you keep your bargain.What other food?Tell us how to get out...or I¹ll destroy you..I'll kill you!It seems to be moving away. Come on...It feels like breath. It makes everything move. Your hair is moving.Jessica -- we must be outside!Sooner or later, we'll have to try somethingThey're good.Why don't we rest here? We know we can eat these.I doubt it.I won't.It all seemed to make sense until Box.You're right...it must be near now. We'll find it.Of course.I have never seen a face like that before. It must be the look of great age. Whoever he was he was terribly old.They all have names and numbers on them. I wonder what they are?How old are you?Your hair is white.Is that what they're called-- cats?How long have you been living here?What kind of place is this?How did you get here?Are there any other humans?Have any other people ever passed through?What makes you think so?Where are they?No--I'm sorry. It's not possible.I'm sorry but I don't have anything to give you.What's beyond this place - do you know?Did your Mother or Father ever mention another place?May we stay here for a while? We'd like to rest.That sweet madman -- how could he Come to exist?One in a million, I supposeThere's nothing to go on to, Jessica.You want there to be one...that Doesn't...That's the same fellow who's outside. If he was so important - why isn't he first?Look at your palm, Francis.... look! It's clear. Clear!I didn't do anything, Francis! They've made us believe that....Not yet.What are we promising him? What can we possibly give him?I'm going to try and tell people what we've seen and--Do you expect me to let things go on without trying to change them?!I know...I know...We're leaving.To a city with thousands and thousands of people.More...many more.I promise. We '11 go on as soon as it's light.Thank you. Tell me - what do those words mean? "Beloved husband²...²Beloved son"... "Beloved wife"'...Stay? They lived together all their years?Sanctuary is the right to live.... nothing more. But nothing less, either....It's part of the hydrogalvanic system. The ocean tides are changed into energy somehow.Of course. I don't know where... I Just took them for granted. It's our only chance.I'm sorry.Can you make it back?You don't have to die!! No one has to die at thirty!!! You don't have to blink out on Lastday. There's no renewal on Carrousel! You can live longer and grow old... I've seen it. She's seen it!! Believe me!!

FRANCIS.raw_line: You should've seen me take my last Runner...perfect. I backed him up against a residence pool and when he terminated...his hand... So now you've seen him...what's the difference awake or asleep?Maybe, maybe not. What's the difference? Come on, Logan, let's get out of here before everybody finds out.Okay...you really want to wake him up?You need a lift. Let's go to Arcade and celebrate... your alert successor...Logan-6.Not in my time...Well, why no!? That's exactly how everything works. How else could the city stay in balance -You have a better idea?Well the minute you get a better idea you can stop wondering. You know, Logan -- you wonder a lot. Too much for a SandmanI don't know what makes you so curious. You have any idea who his seed-mother was?and that's my friend, Logan. We're celebrating his next in line. Carousel - Arcade - who knows? Want to come along?You're thirty -- already? I always thought I was older than you - Well, give it a good try.I guess you never had her?You missed something special.The damned Yellows are getting out of hand. Those three ought to be in Cathedral. No business scrambling in Arcade...Damn! That's right. Just when I feel like an ALL OUT BLAST in Arcade .Only a few? You're just not trying.I'm in my party mood.Yes. But you look a little rusty to me -- what were you doing, wondering?...Well I think you're getting stale. You need old Lucey--Go on. Gee the whole burn--try the new psycho-lift-they tell me it turns you inside out...I'll look for you here when I'm off--These are for me -- you've got your own. She must have been something--?CUBS!You? Why? You're already beautiful.See you in the hydrotoner!What the hell took you so long?I think you've been skulling out too much. First Nursery and now stupid questions.Of course.Look....why don't you get into the water....you need it....more than I do.At Carousel tonight?Can you beat it....I've got the damn wrong bag.What are you talking about?! I saw you let a Runner go? I saw you, Logan?? Tell me!!Logan. I know you're in here. What've you done...gone crazy over a Runner? Nobody knows except me. You know I won't say anything. I should have turned you in but I couldn't. Leave her. Come on out with me. It'll look like you're part of the group that hit this nest. Logan...you're a Sandman! Logan...now...now...Logan...What did you do to him?Why? Why you? Do you know you ruined him? Do you know that? Can you tell me why? Why you? And now you've killed him, you know...Why did you do that??!!Logan! You renewed!
FRANCIS.clean_line: ve seen runner perfect backed residence pool terminated hand ve seen difference awake asleep maybe maybe difference come logan let everybody finds okay want wake need lift let arcade celebrate alert successor logan time exactly works city stay balance better idea minute better idea stop wondering know logan wonder lot sandmani know makes curious idea seed mother friend logan celebrating line carousel arcade knows want come thirty thought older good try guess missed special damned yellows getting hand ought cathedral business scrambling arcade damn right feel like blast arcade trying party mood yes look little rusty wondering think getting stale need old lucey gee burn try new psycho lift tell turns inside ll look ve got cubs beautiful hydrotoner hell took long think ve skulling nursery stupid questions course look water need carousel tonight beat ve got damn wrong bag talking saw let runner saw logan tell logan know ve gone crazy runner knows know won turned couldn leave come ll look like group hit nest logan sandman logan logan know ruined know tell ve killed know logan renewed

JESSICA.raw_line: Please . . .No.No. Just no.No.Nothing. I felt sad, I put myself on the circuit. It was a mistake.A friend of mine went on Carousel tonight. Now he's gone.He was killedIsn't it right? Isn't that what you do? Kill.Nobody. I felt sad. .. I put myself on the circuit.Jessica.No.No.I thought I had to do something.I changed my mindCurious.How a Sandman lives.Not about that.I'm afraid to tell you.Why is it wrong to run?I suppose. But what if you want to live?Six. I go red next year.K.You could have called me yourself.Here I am. Shall I come in?I'm the most beautiful woman you've ever seen, I suppose?Thanks...but I have the choice.Then it's still no.You can have any woman in the city. What do you really want?I don't believe you. There has to be more.Why show me?About running, dying what?I know what everyone knows. Try like hell for Renewal. You have the same chance everyone else has.How can I?Where did you get that?And then you killed him, right?I don't..Please? What friends?I never heard of a Sandman running . . . ever. . .He was born a Sandman. He had no choice.Why Arcade Station?Right at the station itself?What do you need?What're you going to do?I wish I could help you.I wish I knew what you think I know.Of course--You're not going, are you?Maybe they're angry because they're grown in meccano-breeders.Some people say children need human mothering.I'm only telling you what I've heard... Haven't you ever wondered what your seed-mother was Like...?I have.I don't remember exactly...except I was a Green. What would you like to relive, Logan?I've never been in this quadrant. Is that Arcade off there?Muscle? I don't know that one.What's your name?Where do you live, Mary?Why aren't you in Nursery?When do you go up?I'm ashamed. I was bringing you to be killed.Logan, I don't know where Sanctuary is. But if I take you to them, they'll kill you.No. Not that either.I tell you he's running. I know.Follow me, Logan. Stay close.Yes. I don't know what else to do -- with him following us. Why do you keep running from your--He's good, isn't he?They won¹t listen.We'll convince them.Yes, Logan. I'm glad they didn't change your face.No, Holly--wait! He's running. Tell them the rest!Holly. Holly! Please...The other Sandman. Remember the one who came after--Why?- No...no...I'm going with you.There's no turning back, is there?How do we know this is the right way?What do you suppose this was...?Ycch. To kill things and then eat them. It must have been a savage world.It's Francis, isn't it?Wait.You're really one of us now, aren't you?Because you felt like a Runner, didn't you.For us.It's incredibly beautiful.Please.Is there something on fire!!Don't!It's getting dark and cold. I'm tired.Where do you think that heat-ball went?Do you think everything's going to turn to ice?Don't ever let go.Do you think he was telling the Truth?Logan!!!Look!! No...your palm...look!!!Then the answer's Yes..."Beloved Husband". "Beloved Wife". What can all that mean?Francis?Those cracks in your face...do they hurt?Could I touch them?What's your name?But there are so many of them. Do you know each one separately.And...and how were you grown? Inside your mother?Are you sure?Here you can have this.I don't know.No.What belongs to the people?What people?He had a mother and father -- and he knew them.There's a Sanctuary...there is!What¹s that?We'll remember. But that's a long time off...He asked if we would bury him when his time comes.To what?Things won't change...you know that! We can live here together, Logan... have a life as long as his... together!You want to go back to kill, is that it?! Now, you'll want to kill your own!!! kill Sandmen!!! Killing's all you ever...!!!!I want to be alive and with you, that's all I want.Come with us.And Sanctuary?What does that water do?Is it inside the city?

OLD MAN.raw_line: Yes, cats, of course. What else could they be? Cats. Of course each one has his own name too.Yes indeed, everyone. Actually, they all have three. "The naming of cats is a difficult matter. It isn't just one of your holiday games. You may think at first I'm mad as a hatter when I tell you a cat must have THREEFor as long as I can remember.Just a place, I suppose...who knows?I have always been here...Gracious...no.But there may be a few around somewhere.My parents thought so. Mother and Father. You know?Yes...Mother and Father said so... you know?Dead...they're dead...and buried.May I see your hand again?They're beautiful. May I have one too please?What kind of jewel is this?You're both full of secrets like Macavity. Did you steal this?"Macavity, Macavity, there's no one like Macavity, There never was a cat of such deceitfulness and suavity."No, no, noNever, never, ever. Nothing.Of course you can stay. This belongs to the people.All this. All of it.I don't know...but it does.I'll be right back. Oh, yes...about the cats... one rule is true: "Don't speak till you are spoken to."Oh, my don't cry.Oh, my...he died...We¹ll have to bury him.They¹re put into the ground so they can be visited by the living...I¹ll make the arrangements.Are you ready to put him in?All right.Of course...that's settled then. But just you remember your promise...What a pity. I was hoping you'd be here to bury me.Where are you going?Alive?Thousands and thousands...as many as my cats?And all alive you say?Yes, I would like to see that. Is it a long journey?That's better than gold when it's cold.My father was the husband and my mother was the wife. "Beloved" is a word they used - to stay together.Oh, yes...I think...Yes...Oh my...I'll try.Oh, my...
